description: Wood anemone (Anemone nemorosa 'Blue Eyes') is an amazing species of wildflower that blooms in early spring. Its delicate white petals are adorned with striking blue stamens in the middle, giving it its name. Itâ€™s a hardy plants that spreads quickly and is low maintenance, adding plenty of color to shady parts of the garden. It's an excellent choice for naturalizing woodland and is friendly to pollinators like bees and butterflies. Plus, its foliage stays green until late summer, making it a beautiful accent for the entire season. Wood anemone is truly a stunning and versatile wildflower.
